verbose_text: Furthermore, the amount of malondialdehyde (MDA), which is an oxidant parameter, has been found to be increased, and the level of total glutathione (tGSH), which is an endogenous antioxidant, has been found to be decreased in mucositis; it has been reported that this is associated with oxidative stress and inflammation [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] of oropharyngeal mucositis.
